title: 27 years after its release, an uncovered ‘Scream’ Easter egg reveals who the killers were all along
description: It was right there in front of us this whole time.

title: That A.I.-Generated Wes Anderson Star Wars Trailer May Have Gone Viral, But It Flat-Out Sucks
description: You saw it, right? I know you did. It was all over Twitter, spreading like a sick, sad wildfire through every new blue check account — and those without Twitter Blue who felt the need to give their opinion too. It's hard not to have something to say about that AI-generated Wes Anderson-style "Star Wars" trailer, but here's the only real thing to say about it: It totally sucks, and I'll tell you why.

title: Nepo daddy James Gunn explains why he surrounds himself with a regular troupe of ‘non-jerks’
description: If you make a good impression, you might have a job for life.

title: Emma Watson Reveals Why She Stepped Away From Acting
description: It’s been a while since Harry Potter star Emma Watson has released any project, and she has a good reason for it.

title: Hollywood Writers Go On Strike As Talks Fail With Studios
description: The Writers Guild of America (WGA) is officially on strike as of Tuesday, May 2. Per the statement posted to the WGA's official website, the Boards of Directors of the WGA West and East "voted unanimously" to authorize the strike after "six weeks of negotiations" with the studios presented by the Alliance of Motion Picture and Television Producers (AMPTP), including Amazon, Apple, Disney, Discovery-Warner, Netflix, NBC Universal, Paramount, and Sony.

title: Moviegoers longingly recall the cinematic experiences they narrowly missed out on
description: If only we'd been born sooner.

title: ‘Gran Turismo’ Races Into Theaters With First Trailer
description: The game is now a movie. Continue reading…

title: Academy Awards Set New Campaign Rules Following Controversial Best Actress Run
description: New Oscar guidelines are put in place following Andrea Riseborough's controversial nomination for Best Actress.

title: Guardians Of The Galaxy Vol. 3's Cosmo Is Based On The Tragic True Story Of Laika The Space Dog
description: The "Guardians of the Galaxy" franchise has introduced plenty of colorful characters over the past decade, from a talking raccoon named Rocket, to a sentient tree named Groot, to the antennae-sporting alien, Mantis. Yet few new additions have been as instantaneously accepted as friend-shaped like Cosmo, the adorable space dog voiced by Maria Bakalova in "The Guardians of the Galaxy Holiday Special." So far, we've only gotten a bit of screen time with Cosmo, but we know that she's telekinetic, loves Kevin Bacon, took a liking to Sean Gunn's Kraglin, and is, in the parlance of dog owners, "food motivated."

title: Brian Michael Bendis Recalls Some Dumb Lines He Wrote For Samuel L. Jackson's Iron Man Post-Credit Scene
description: Comic book legend Brian Michael Bendis recalled how he worked all night to make sure Iron Man's post-credit scene had all the dialogue it needed.
